website_summaries.verdict: This mattress fits just about any playard, thanks to its rounded corner design. It can double as a sleep mat when baby outgrows the playard.
pros: Measures  37.5" x 26" x 1.5" Includes carrying bag for portability
Can be used with playard or without as a nap mat
cons: Tight fitted sheets may pull this mattress up at the corners

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly in my Greco Pack N’ Play, very comfortable for my 6 month old to sleep on, way better than the mat it originally came with! Definitely recommend, it’s worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No sheets fit, causing dangerous bowing
customer_reviews.text: This will travel well as each folded part is completely separate from the next. It fits well in our graco pack and play and seems as though it is comfortable. However, even stretchy, fitted pack and play sheets do not fit this and it bows up at the side. Unless I can find a sheet that will comfortably fit this without bowing I will not be using it until baby is much older. Overall disappointed in the purchase. Will update if I can find sheets.
customer_reviews.author: ddk789

customer_reviews.title: Too large
customer_reviews.text: I have the exact same Graco Play Yard posted in the example picture. That is the only reason I bought this particular mattress. However the mattress is about 2 inches too big to fit properly. Yes I will just trim 1" of the memory foam pads on the left and right sides, but I shouldn't have to. Trimming the edges means it doesnt fit correct in the 3 compartment zippered cover AND also cancels any returns if something happens. So trim at your own risk. Picture is misleading. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: CastleTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. It fit the graco pack n play perfectly ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. It fit the graco pack n play perfectly and my daughter was comfortable when sleeping. It packs away easy in it's carrying case. The foam panels come out so the cover can be easily washed. The only drawback is putting the foam back in is a little difficult, but not terrible. Great product and worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Galeza

customer_reviews.title: Great, thin mattress but not for every playpen
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is super soft and the carrying case is great for travel. That being said, it definitely doesn’t fit our playpen very well. We’re still using it since our daughter is old enough now where it’s not a concern to have a gap. The only thing is now her toys tend to fall into the crevice so it’s harder for her to reach them. Most of the other reviews seem to have no problem with the Graco playpen fitting so I definitely recommend it for them - if you have a different brand though, I wouldn’t trust it for a young baby.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! So glad I purchase it!
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT FIT for my Graco pack and play! The original mat that comes with the pack and play is hard and my little one seemed so uncomfortable on it! This definitely made a difference in her comfort level! By the way, she only sleeps supervised on the infant lounger pillow. She has reflux and we are currently using the mattress in the top part of the pack and play, and the crib wedge I have fits perfectly under it! I’m very happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Deana R.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit Graco Quick Connect
customer_reviews.text: This is supposed to be for my Graco pack and play but it doesn't fit 🙄👎🏽. Its about 4in longer then the mattress pad that is with the unit. And if you shove it to hit, it just pops up which can't be safe
customer_reviews.author: aloha mama

customer_reviews.title: Molds to body and not in a good way.
customer_reviews.text: The pad looks great, and the carrying case is very nice however after sleeping on it for one night there is now an imprint of my 5-month-old son's body in the foam. It reshapes after a few hours of him being off it, but as soon as I lay him down it molds around him more so then I think memory foam should. For the cost, I wouldn't expect this to happen. He was not a fan therefore neither am I. I would like to return and get a refund, but not sure how I will get it back into the box it came in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Toxic chemicals
customer_reviews.text: It's polyurethane. This is toxic & shouldn't be allowed on the market!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pad
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to fit in our Graco pack & play. It fits perfectly and the Graco pack & play sheet fits on it amazingly well. I love that this folds up and has its own travel bag. It comes in handy when we travel. My toddler finds it way more comfortable to lay on when sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: Happy2Shop21

customer_reviews.title: It fits in a Chicco lullaby play pen!!
customer_reviews.text: Received product today, really happy to see that it fit perfectly in the Chicco pack n play that I have. It got to where We had to transition from the bassinet into something larger. As we are in a temporary living situation and have yet to build the crib, this pad will make the pack and play work for now. I do have the original mattress that came with the pack n play underneath for the sturdiness and it seems to be exactly what I had hoped it would be. Oh, and I didn’t notice any strong odors of plastic like some of the other reviewers had mentioned.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie Clarke

customer_reviews.title: Unsafe!
customer_reviews.text: I am honestly surprised by all the 5 star reviews on this mattress. We were SO disappointed to see how flimsy this was. If you spend $50 on a mattress, you will likely want to put a sheet on it, yes? Well, the moment you put sheets on this thing, it starts to bow in on itself and creates a very lumpy and uneven sleeping surface. This is straight up DANGEROUS for infants who would be sleeping on it. We are returning it immediately and will find something that's safer for our little one to use
customer_reviews.author: Gabby

customer_reviews.title: Dimensions not right.
customer_reviews.text: Wrong size. Maybe I got a blooper? But it’s about 2 inches too big for my specific pack and play (the one pictured in the ad is actually the same one I have!). When I measured the mattress it came in just short of 39 inches long and just about 26 1/4 inches wide. The width fit perfectly in the pack and play but the length not good at all. :-( will be returning and searching for a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Momof Boys

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had bought this long ago
customer_reviews.text: we've had this for a few months and it has fit perfectly and snugly into 3 pack n plays. It did not even come close to fitting into the 4moms brand which is much bigger. We bought it because our pack n play's skinny little mattress/floor had slats that were starting to overlap and seemed very uncomfortable. We just put this mattress on top and it is so cozy and nice, I wish I had thought to buy it sooner. It is for our 18 month-old but it seems firm enough for a baby too. It does not sink in or seem unsafe.
customer_reviews.author: Mollie R Daves

customer_reviews.title: Fits pack and play perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Like some of the other reviews, I thought I had a pack and play with odd dimensions and wasn't sure if this mattress would fit. It fits the pack and play perfectly. It is a welcome addition, adding much needed comfort for sleeping. My son naps in the pack and play at daycare. I also look forward to having it for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Sleeping Baby = Happy Parents
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Baby will not sleep on a pack and play mattress, but slept like a dream on this. We've used it both in the Graco P&P and hotel cribs with equal success. I put it on top of the P&P mattress and then tuck the sheet around both, as this keeps the mattress flat, as otherwise it buckles at the folds (probably because my sheets are elasticated). I do the same with hotel mattresses, but always checking this doesn't make it too high for your baby so that they can climb out!! The only downside is that it is another bulky thing to travel with, but honestly, for the quality of sleep, it's worth it every time.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Mac

customer_reviews.title: Way to firm for a 5 mobths old baby
customer_reviews.text: I bought it tonuse our new Pack and Play as a crib in the master bedroom because my son was only 5months old when he grew put of his bassinet and didnt like the mattress that comes with the pack and play because it was to hard. This one it is slightly less firm but still VERY unconfortable. It came sealt in plastic so once you open it gets huge and bulky. That is why I did not return it :(
customer_reviews.author: Marina K

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and great for traveling
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is sooo much better than the flimsy pad thing that comes with the original pack n play. There is no way my baby would have slept on that thing alone. This folds up so it’s perfect for traveling. It’s soft and comfy and my baby sleeps well on it. I haven’t been able to find another product that actually folds up like this, so this one is perfect because it’s too difficult and takes up too much space to lug around a giant mattress. Definitely would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Lee

customer_reviews.title: Nice and soft, no safety issues with our Graco.
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is great. We bought this for our pack and play when taking our 2 year old on a 3 week trip. The pack and play mattress is too firm, he sleeps on it, but restlessly, I was worried about how that would effect our trip, if the baby had poor sleep for 3 weeks! This mattress went right over the top of the firm pack and play mattress, adding a little cushy comfort, and he slept very well! We have a Graco packnplay, and it fit perfectly with no gaps.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle DuMont

customer_reviews.title: Daughter sleeps better on the extra padding
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money. I wish I had bought this earlier, we travel so much and the pack-n-play was so hard! My daughter seems more rested and can sleep in the pack n play for longer periods of time without crankiness like before. Only negative is it’s fairly bulky to pack and transport but not impossible. Oh and it gives her the little extra boost she needs to can crawl out of the pack n play. Luckily it hasn’t become an issue yet.
customer_reviews.author: T P

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: I don’t normally leave bad reviews but I am so disappointed. I bought this mattress for my sons graco pack n play because we travel a lot in The summer and it doesn’t fit. It also didn’t come with the travel bag it said it came with. It’s cheaply made and for the price it is definitely not worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best pack n play mattress I’ve seen! So comfortable for my daughter. I just came back to see how to wash it after a year to find out the cover is removable! They literally thought of everything. I travel a lot and this fits perfectly in my trunk when it’s full! I absolutely love this purchase. I bought one before it that was a joke. This is like Heaven compared to it! If you’re wondering if it’s worth the cost, it’s 100% worth giving your kids something more comfortable to sleep on that than rock hard pack n play Mat. Surprisingly it was cheaper than the competition.
customer_reviews.author: Cortney

customer_reviews.title: LOVE! Great for traveling and A+ customer service from this seller!
customer_reviews.text: I love this pack and play mattress. It’s foldable and fits my Graco pack n play perfectly. I love that it folds up and comes with a duffel bag for traveling or storage. My 4 month old literally fell asleep on it the first time she laid on the mattress. Soooo much more comfy than the thin cardboard base! Also HUGE shoutout to this seller for amazing customer service! I received a mattress that had a broken zipper on the cover. I contacted the seller and within 24 hours they had a brand new mattress shipped out to me. 👍👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Hannah E

customer_reviews.title: Fits well
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the mattress for the travel Pack N' Play that we offer to visiting families in our vacation rental. I was very pleased with the overall fit and ease of set-up and that it even came with its own travel bag for secure and clean storage when not in use. As for comfort I couldn't really say as no baby has yet slept on it, but I will make sure to inquire when it happens. So far the mattress makes the travel crib look very cozy and comfy. Let's hope the next baby visitor thinks the same when it comes to nap time.
customer_reviews.author: Renate Callahan

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter would refuse to sleep in her pack n play when we would travel. Since buying this she sleeps in it all night! Since having another child she mainly sleeps in the pack n play and she always tells me how soft it is. I should note that if your buying this to put into the infant part of the new pack in plays it is not ment to go there, so don't get your hopes up!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Like but takes adjusting
customer_reviews.text: We like the product for the concept, extra padding in the pack n play when traveling. It fits in our graco perfectly Downside, it wants to fold up on us when we use a fitted sheet. Do not use pack n play sheets with it. You need to use either a regular fitted crib sheet and pull it farther over the edges, or use a folded twin top sheet like we do and get some mattress/sheet clips. This allows the mattress to lay more flat than a pack n play sheet does but you can still get the sheet tight for a safe sleep space.
customer_reviews.author: LuLuLiz

customer_reviews.title: A must for anyone who uses pack n plays for sleeping
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wouldn’t sleep in a pack and play before and with this mat we recently purshased for our weekend trip she slept in the pack n play all weekend long straight through the night. This extra padding is a must for us if we go anywhere that she needs to spend the night in a pack n play. And I don’t blame her the mats that come with the pack n plays are so thin and hard I wouldn’t want to sleep on it either.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Travel game changer!
customer_reviews.text: My 8 month old used to sleep terribly when we traveled - the mattress that comes with the pack n play is just terrible. I bought this right before Christmas travels and he slept great!! This fits inside a regular Graco pack n play. There aren't any gaps around the edges. It is very soft so I'm not sure I would put a little baby on it, but my son is strong and knows how to lift his head/roll so I wasn't concerned about any safety issues. Love the fact that it folds up for easy storage/travel.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This mattress has been a lifesaver for my 1.5 year old. It fit our Graco pack n play perfectly and had no smell. Between traveling, vacation and moving, my little one hasn't missed a wink of sleep. It was very comfortable. I found that these sheets fit it perfectly and were very soft (TILLYOU Jersey Knit Whale Pack N Play Sheets, Mini Portable Crib Sheets Set Fitted for Girls, Ultra-Soft Breathable Playard Playpen Sheets, Ocean). Highly recommend for any parent of a little one.
customer_reviews.author: Cwhited

customer_reviews.title: Love this!! Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I don't write reviews often unless I’m blow away....and here we are! Travel bag is well made and used weekly as I use this at work and then clean weekly. Easy to remove pads and clean cover. I was impressed by the initial packing and timely delivery. 2 weeks later and the memory foam is still awesome; sooo easy to clean the cover and I travel with it back and forth to work daily. Love live love this product and carrying bag
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Just what the Play and Pack Needed
customer_reviews.text: Someone gave my niece a Play and Pack. However it was missing the mattress. I measured the area. This mattress fit perfectly into the Play and Pack. The 4 month old baby seemed content to play while reclining on it. Now this Play and Pack is on its way overseas. The foldable mattress fit easily into packed luggage. It will serve as a temporary play space and bed until the rest of the Play and Pack arrives.
customer_reviews.author: Trician

customer_reviews.title: Great for pack-n-play
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to use in the Graco pack-n-play while traveling to give our son some extra padding since he’d be sleeping the night in it. The pads they come with are fine for play, but not that cushy for sleeping. This fits perfectly and adds a nice cushion, but not so soft that I’d consider it dangerous (he’s 1, I probably wouldn’t use this for a newborn to be safe). I used a regular crib sheet to cover it which was a little big but worked fine enough. I love how it’s a tri-fold and it comes with its own carrying case, makes travel easy. Perfect for what we needed and exactly what we were looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Baby seems to enjoy it, would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: My son sleeps in a pack n play weekly for nap at my in-laws and we use this mattress on top of the existing one; and we've used it for bed time on trips multiple times as well. Our son has done very well on it and it seems to be MUCH more comfortable than if he slept on just the pack n play mattress/base. We've been using it from 10mo-15mo and so far no issue. The travel bag is convenient as well!
customer_reviews.author: sylvia

customer_reviews.title: Too big for pack n play
customer_reviews.text: I was excited about this foldable mattress as it makes sense with the traveling system. It was well packaged and folds nicely. Thinner than expected (even after allowing 48hrs to "expand" and "air out" the smell. See pictures... its definitely 3 to 4 inches too long. Maybe this batch la lacked quality control. Returned item, but had to obtain Amazon Customer Service as item requires special handling due to size.
customer_reviews.author: ILoveMyAmazonBoxs

customer_reviews.title: Too big for graco
customer_reviews.text: Padding is nice and fluffy way better than the pack n play mat. Didn't notice any smell when opening. Left the pad out for several days and it fluffed back up after shipping. However it doesn't fit our graco pack n play length wise. Its too big by about 2-3 inches which seems to be A LOT. Just have it bent up on one end. Hopefully it won't be an issue with our 1 yr old or attract her attention to pull at. Or else will cut like others have done. Great material for the cover and pad, would be 5 stars if it actually fit well.
customer_reviews.author: NH

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy for My Toddler
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this is a good mattress. It’s comfotable and my 1.5-year-old slept well on it. I gave 4 stars because every time I tried to get a fitted sheet on it, the mattress folded itself up. I ended up just wrapping a twin sheet around it. Also, as other people have mentioned, the bag has a weird smell.
customer_reviews.author: Colina

customer_reviews.title: Small, squishy, and well made!
customer_reviews.text: Fits with a little gap in our Guava Lotus travel crib but she’s old enough that I’m not worried about it. Nice and squishy, seems to be high quality! The carrying bag is very nicely made with a sturdy zipper. It’s currently living under our pikler triangle as pictured for a nice squishy tent bed. It does need a couple days to fully puff up and stop smelling like foam so plan to not use it right away.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Comfort for baby!
customer_reviews.text: As soon as it arrived, let it air out and puff up. It fold up well in the carry case. It does take up room in the car but worth it for baby to sleep through the night. Used a normal crib sheet around mattress and original pack in play mattress and it worked well. Fit original pack n play. I finally don’t feel bad for putting baby down for a nap in the pack n play when traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Knorr

customer_reviews.title: BED BUGS
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT!! I brought it home and put it out in the sun to air out and when I unzipped the cover there bed bugs crawling all over the place!!! So gross!!!!
customer_reviews.author: S. Mcgregor

customer_reviews.title: Great night’s sleep for baby and easy to carry!
customer_reviews.text: My baby refused to sleep on the pack n play pad, which was a problem since we were going out of town for a week. We tried my sister’s mattress, but my baby still didn’t sleep very well. I was so excited to find this mattress! In addition to providing a great night’s rest, the memory foam absorbed the sound of my baby’s kicking in the middle of the night! The carrying case was also INCREDIBLY convenient!
customer_reviews.author: BRP

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Before we got this mattress my son absolutely refused to sleep in his pack n play. Ever since we got this, he sleeps in it no problem. It’s super convenient travel case is a huge plus too.
customer_reviews.author: Kristie Snoddy

customer_reviews.title: Comfy mattress
customer_reviews.text: Love this mattress. It is perfect for my 5 month old. She is super long and outgrew her bassinet so I had to move her into her pack n play. The mattress fits perfectly. It’s soft but firm enough the your baby doesn’t sink down. My baby sleeps great on it! It fits perfectly in my Graco Pack N Play.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Mattress great, bonus bag is junk
customer_reviews.text: The mattress itself seems pretty good and firm enough and yet soft enough for my baby. However the "bonus bag" was garbage, the teeth on the zipper looked as though it were missing some and didn't work. I was never even able to use it which was actually a part of me wanting to get it because we are traveling with it. I would also highly recommend heeding the advice on the actual package to air out the mattress because I left it out overnight in a separate room and the whole room smelled. So I highly recommend airing out the mattress before you use it.
customer_reviews.author: Webs

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect in Pack & Play
customer_reviews.text: This fits perfect in Graco Pack & Play. Nice thick foam mattress. My little 7-lb maltese sleeps in it at night & for naps. She loves it. The mattress really helped make it softer for her. I use the sheets made for the mattress - 3 pack of sheets for about $7 is a great deal!
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Great for EVERYONE in the house's sleep quality!
customer_reviews.text: Adding this mattress to my pack n play made all the difference in my grandbaby's sleep quality. Buying this mattress improved EVERYONE'S sleep over the holidays, lol! I also bought a sheet for it and he snoozes through the night when they're visiting with no problem now.
customer_reviews.author: StockShowMom

customer_reviews.title: Recommend this mattress!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mattress for the pack and play! My son gets watched by both his grandparents while I’m at work and sleeps in a pack and play while being watched! He won’t sleep in a pack and play unless this mattress is inside. It’s comfortable, fits perfectly in both the graco and Cosco pack and play and a pack and play fitted sheet cover fits perfect around it, once placed inside no bunching, lays flat! Perfect for traveling or sleeping at grandmas! Definitely recommend, your baby will thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara M Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Tote smells terrible
customer_reviews.text: Great mattress. The tote for the mattress smells TERRIBLE and no amount of airing out seems to work. The mattress was wrapped so it didn’t smell bad. We don’t use the tote.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: This is the perfect mattress for the pack and play
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect mattress for the pack and play. My grandson sleeps comfortably on in and it's easy to fold and store for travel. It's the PERFECT pack and play mattress!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Balamane

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cushioned addition to the pack and play!
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I absolutely love this mattress! We have an Ingenuity pack and play and it fit perfectly inside. We love the cushion, not too thin or too thick. It gives baby the right amount of cushion to give her a good night’s rest. We love how compact it is and easy to transport from grandparent’s place back to our place. The plus is that it comes in a nice, durable bag for easy transportation and we know it’ll be kept clean when stored in the bag. Overall we love the product and would recommend it to our friends!
customer_reviews.author: E.L.

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable But Kind of Bulky
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is perfect for what it is intended. It makes pack n plays much more comfortable! It is kind of hard to get a pack n play sheet on it since they are so small, but once on, it works great. It folds in three in a carrying case which is very convenient, but it is definitely added space in your car. We bought it when traveling when we realized not all pack n plays are as comfortable as others, and our son loves it! Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Hottel

customer_reviews.title: Dream sweet dreams.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mattress for the travel bed my dog sleeps in!! She is 4.5 pounds and needed a flat surface that was comfortable. She loves it, first night out she cuddled up and slept like a dream. Great product, highly recommend it to all for 2 legged and 4 kids.
customer_reviews.author: GamingLadyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Not for safe sleep!!!
customer_reviews.text: Not for safe sleep!!! Doesn’t follow the ABCs of safe sleep. Also didn’t fit my Graco pack n play very well.
customer_reviews.author: baffledQ

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: It’s not as thick as I was hoping. But being thinner makes it easier for traveling. It comes with a removable cover, which my kiddo already put to the poop test. I’d still recommend an additional cover or sheet on top of the mattress for easier cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Spotstephanie

customer_reviews.title: Daughter slept great
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and super easy to travel with. So glad I purchased this for our vacation this summer. My daughter is used to a memory foam mattress in her crib so sleeping on the cardboard box the pack and plays come with definitely would not have worked!
customer_reviews.author: Breanne

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in material and size
customer_reviews.text: The memory foam initially felt very nice upon touching. However, when placed in the pack and play, the middle base/bar of the pack and play can be felt through the mattress. The mattress is also too big for ours, so even though I shoved it in, it pops up on one end, making it a hazard. Will be returning
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Conveniently comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This thing is wonderful! Before we were traveling with this unfoldable pack n play matress, which did work, she slept through The whole night. It was Not practical though. I couldn't sleep on just a pack n play. When we 1st got this, it smelled funny but they said it would so you have to air it out. Once you air it out it does not smell. She slept on this all night did not even Stir. And when we , this folded up neatly into its travel case and it doesn't take up a lot of space. I would highly recommend this if you're traveling with a baby.
customer_reviews.author: Chassidy

customer_reviews.text: This mattress is perfect for my pack n play. My daughter loved it straight outta the box. We used it for family vacation where she slept in her pack n play for a week. No issues, only qualm was the smell, it was a little off putting, but that’s just foam mattress in general. I let it air out for a few hours and it disappeared.
customer_reviews.author: Alt

customer_reviews.title: Missing travel bag
customer_reviews.text: It seems comfortable and nicely padded/thick. But it did not come with the travel bag as mentioned. I bought this one specifically for this reason as we’ll be traveling a lot over the holidays. If I can’t get the bag ASAP, I’m returning.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer M.

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for the playpen my 9 month old sleeps in hoping it would feel more like our bed and he would stop sleeping with us! He seems to love it, and when we went to visit family we just folded it up and took it with us and it worked great in place of taking the whole playpen! Totally recommend
customer_reviews.author: Adryianna Haar

customer_reviews.title: Not your best option.
customer_reviews.text: Returned this one for a different mattress. This was thinner than I wanted. Additionally, since it is thinner, when I tried putting a sheet on it the mattress would either bend up or the sheet would raise up and not stay along the edges.
customer_reviews.author: Brittani B.

customer_reviews.title: Super soft, thick, no chemicals, will last a long time
customer_reviews.text: Got this mattress for my 5 month old grandson to sleep on when he visits and he sleeps really well and hardly fussed at all, I would definitely recommend it. Also you don’t have any strong chemicals in the mattress like most and the material is soft to the touch with easy clean up. You can’t go wrong with this mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Ray

customer_reviews.title: Good bed!
customer_reviews.text: I have the ingenuity playard that is 39 by 27 it was hard to find a mattress I ordered this one knowing that it was going to be small and it was on the end but it wasn't a problem bc she doesn't go to that side and when she does I'll put a blanket under the sheets so it's fine. My baby sleeps all night and just wakes up to feed and goes back to sleep and when she wakes up in the mornings she's just chilling so I'm guessing it's great lol
customer_reviews.author: Genesis Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Small, not easily re assembled
customer_reviews.text: It is comfortable and easily compacted for travel, but it does not fit correctly in the pack n play. It's too small and has about an inch around every edge from the mattress to the siding of the bed. Once I removed the cover to wash, the memory foam pieces did not fit back in correctly ever again and is now not laying flat for having to squish the foam in to zip it fully.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome cozy to go mattress for my baby's pack n play! Customer service is awazing. Ordered the wrong size and was able to re order i less than 2 days! It fit beautifully and even my sheets fit! Super excited for my baby to go to bed tonight. Totally recommend. **i have a babytrend deluxe pack n play.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Second one is not as good as previous purchase
customer_reviews.text: Second purchase of this mattress. The first one was wonderful. This one came in a vaccuum sealed package flat as heck. The first one was in a regular box. I'm keeping this because I don't have time to get a new one before our trip but I'm disappointed by the item the second time around
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect!! We keep a pack and play at grandma and grandpa’s beach house for sleep overs, but they are so uncomfortable! This helped little one sleep better. It’s soft, fits perfectly, folds up and has a washable cover- perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Jillian

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for traveling
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for. It fits great in my Graco pack and play. There is a small gap but nothing too major. So convenient to pack up and travel with. They carrying bag is a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: The Hawk

customer_reviews.title: Really nice mattress.
customer_reviews.text: This folding mattress worked great to put in my grandson's pack and play. It was firm enough to support him but soft enough to be comfortable. Would certainly purchase again. Great for travel.
customer_reviews.author: DrPepper1330

customer_reviews.title: Cranky 20 month old slept like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Pack and play sleeping arrangements make for a cranky 20 month old. This helped so much--worked perfectly, fit the standard Graco pack and play perfectly, and my little one slept like a charm. Happy with the purchase. Lightweight to lug around and serves the purpose for everyone getting rest while we were traveling.
customer_reviews.author: E-steffi

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: This was a lifesaver for our vacation. My son is 21 months old and needed the extra cushion for the pack and play. Let it air out for a few days prior to using it but the smells goes away quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Peace and love mama ✌🏼

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress for a pack & play!
customer_reviews.text: This was a lifesaver for our recent travels. It fit our Graco pack & play perfect. More importantly, our LO had the best sleep on it! We used it for traveling in hotels and while at our in laws. She used to be so restless in the thin mat it came with and this saved the whole experience!
customer_reviews.author: sanddollar8

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but for older toddlers
customer_reviews.text: We only bought this because he was approaching one, would not recommend for children younger than one, it is too soft. That being said he loves it now but still prefers to sleep with us.
customer_reviews.author: Starla

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for extra comfort.
customer_reviews.text: We have been displaced and needed a comfier travel bed situation for our toddlers. This pad was exactly what we needed. It gives comfort, fits in the pack and play nicely, and travels well.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a larger 85lb Dutch Shepherd. I purchased a fitted sheet as well and it holds up well for the dog, so I’m sure it will for a child.
customer_reviews.author: RICH

customer_reviews.title: Baby gets quality sleep on the go
customer_reviews.text: Aired it out for a couple of days and washed cover when it arrived. Simple to put back together. We put it in the stroller bag and checked it on our flight. 7 month old baby slept like he was at home for naps and at night while we were away. Easy care, easy storage with the carrying case that fit's it perfectly. Pack and play sheet fits snugly, and regular crib sheet also fits over it. We will probably use as toddler on the go bed when he outgrows pack and play.
customer_reviews.author: Sugar

customer_reviews.title: this is not memory foam
customer_reviews.text: The product provides a mattress for the pack and play, but it is definitely not memory foam. I expect to pay more for memory foam. This was not cheap and although I will not return it , I am disappointed with the product.
customer_reviews.author: JDF

customer_reviews.title: Must-Have for Traveling Toddlers
customer_reviews.text: My son is a year old, and now that he sleeps on a crib mattress, I didn’t want him to have a bad sleep in the pack-n-play when we travel. This mattress fits perfectly, and he slept great!
customer_reviews.author: Drew Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Comfy! Worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: My 6 month old baby loves it! He never slept well with the regular pad from the Graco pack and play. When we are out of the home he enjoys his naps or overnight visits. He even slept through the night in a tent when we went camping! I would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mattress as advertised
customer_reviews.text: So far I don't know if sleep has improved, because we have other sleep issues we're working on, but when he moves around in the crib there is less rustling so I'm hoping it will eventually help him sleep better. I didn't notice the scent to be particularly strong when I opened it. The cover has individual zips for each foam cell, which is nice. Will take it on an upcoming trip, so hopefully it will be really handy for that.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Sego

customer_reviews.title: Great little mattress
customer_reviews.text: We used it for our first mini vacation and it was so helpful to have this portable mattress. It was easy to set up and fold away. The carry bag is nice too. I simply put a regular crib sheet tucked the extra sheet underneath and it fit perfectly. Would highly recommend for travelling.
customer_reviews.author: AMG

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Its fits perfectly in our baby trend play yard. It's very comfy for being the thinner of playard mattresses. It's a great quality and my baby loves it. After reading reviews I decided to go with this mattress rather than a 5 inch because my baby likes to climb. I'm glad we did.
customer_reviews.author: Aj Graham

customer_reviews.title: Necessity
customer_reviews.text: When I saw that there was a mattress for playpens I was very excited to get this. It is comfortable and baby doesn't have to sleep on a hard floor-like bottom of playpen.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Roldan

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This was EXACTLY what I was looking for. Fits perfectly with our Graco Pack n Play. The sheets for the graco (purchased at target) makes the mattress fold up. So I purchased the jersey sheets recommended with this product under “what others bought” and they fit/worked like a charm!
customer_reviews.author: Jessi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I have a pack n play and it is definitely not safe to load it up with blankets for comfy sleeping. I bought this because my baby wasnt sleeping good on that hard what they call a mattress the pack n play comes with. He is sleeping his full naps now.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: My baby slept like a baby:)
customer_reviews.text: Used this for my 1 yr old while traveling. It fits perfectly in the PnP. She slept the same 11 hrs that she sleeps in her crib. It feels like a soft memory foam. Just put a normal crib sheet over it and plopped it in the PnP. Came with nice canvas carrying case which I filled with baby clothes and checked it at the airport.
customer_reviews.author: J. Shep

customer_reviews.title: Not Memory Foam
customer_reviews.text: This product is advertised as memory foam and it is definitely not memory foam, it is just three pieces of regular foam padding. It packs well and has a nice carry bag. The cover comes of easy for washing.
customer_reviews.author: G.Macniak

customer_reviews.title: Worth buying
customer_reviews.text: I was a little hesitant because of some of the bad reviews. I really like this mattress . It’s comforting knowing my daughter is more comfortable but most importantly the mattress is safe for sleeping. I waited until she was five months old but this mattress seems to have the right firmness and softness for babies. Very happy with the product . I have two pax plays and I intend on buying another mattress for it
customer_reviews.author: Renee Rudloff

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: Our one year old sleeps terribly in a pack and play. This mattress has made all the difference. Slept similarly to how they do at home. Used in our grace pack n play with a grace pack n play sheet.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Great for naps and play! Actually use this every day as a mat to play on for my 6 month old. It’s thick enough to cushion her on those falls as she learns to stand and walk. Easy to move and put anywhere and I do not have to worry about how dirty the floor is. Packs away nicely in the carrying bag for outings and of course fits well in the pack n play for naps at places other than home. Easy to wash cover and great memory foam inside for extra comfort and protection.
customer_reviews.author: JanaPederson

customer_reviews.title: Not ideal.
customer_reviews.text: This mattress does not work when using a fitted sheet. The minute the pressure of the sheet wraps around this mattress, it begins to fold on it own. Mattress is also too big for the Graco pack n play we have. We tried making the mattress work by using a flat sheet, however the mattress never laid flush/flat. The folding ability seemed convenient, but was not ideal at all.
customer_reviews.author: M.Smith

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t fit a 4moms pack n play
customer_reviews.text: Great product! It’s comfortable and easy to wash. Each fold unzips so you can wash the coved. The only thing is that it doesn’t not for a 4moms breeze pack n play. There is a good 3-4 inches gap around the whole mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie Terry

customer_reviews.title: It ok if you use it with/on top of your existing mattress
customer_reviews.text: Must place this on top of your preexisting pack and play mattress as it just flops, bends, sinks and caves. It's an ok as an addition to your pack and play mattress but definitely doesn't work as a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Snowball

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this mini mattress specifically for travelling. My almost 2 y.o. toddler has been sleeping in Cribette with the mattress for a week and it was fantastic sleep. I vote for this product as it is really good.
customer_reviews.author: Natalya Sandberg

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for travelling and at home use!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for travelling and at home use! Our baby sleeps so much better especially when travelling with this in a pack n play. I also have peace of mind that she's sleeping on something clean and safe since she is usually in hotel-provided PNP and we bring our own sheets.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara N.

customer_reviews.title: missing parts
customer_reviews.text: It did not come with the bag as the ad said.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle V Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Luxurious pad!
customer_reviews.text: Product is extremely soft to the touch, and comfortable in general! I will be using a waterproof mattress cover for it for more protection. I love that it can be collapsed into thirds for travel. I have twins and will be ordering another for the other pack n play for travel!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Malooly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect graco pac n play fit. Comfy and durable!
customer_reviews.text: Fit the Graco pac n play perfectly:) used this on a trip to Disneyland and my 11month old slept well through the night on it. Super pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Cynnamon

customer_reviews.title: Can make it work for Graco Pack N Play
customer_reviews.text: It definitely is too big for a typical Graco Pack N Play. I was frustrated when I first tried to set it in our Pack N Play, but then figured why not just trim the foam on the side piece to make it the appropriate size. Now it fits perfect and will be great for our upcoming trip. Yes, annoying that they say it fits something when it doesn’t, but it was easy enough to fix myself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you travel
customer_reviews.text: If you travel... you need this. Yes the bag has the factory smell, I washed the bag and the mattress cover on delicate and dried in low heat, no more smell. Very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth ZayasTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Fit Graco Pack N Play perfect, note we also have a Joovy Room and it was several inches in both length and width for that. This helps my LO sleep all night long in pack n play with no issues. Comfortable and cover was washable with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: NapYou Amazon Exclusive Pack n Play Mattress, Convenient Fold with Bonus Easy Handle Carry Bag
feature_bullets: TRI-FOLD PACK N' PLAY MATTRESS - Using the highest qualities with your babies satisfaction in mind we've created the ultimate foldable mattress for babies measuring in at 37.5 x 26 x 1.5 with rounded corners to make sure your NapYou Pack and Play mattress can perfectly fit into any Pack n Play.
ORGANIC COTTON - Soft to the touch, we've made the tri-fold Pack n Play mattress with organic cotton and polyester blend so not only will it be durable, but extremely soft to the touch for your baby.
BONUS EASY HANDLE CARRY BAG - We've included a convenient carry bag with the Pack and Play mattress that you can conveniently fold up and place in the bag along with a small blanket.
USE WITH OR WITHOUT A PACK N PLAY - The NapYou Pack n Play tri-fold mattress is designed to be used with or with an actual Pack and Play, which can make a perfect sleeping mat.
Allow 24 to 48 hours for foam to expand

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars1,013 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
